ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] [EQtinkering] Don't send facking attachments...
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow Mauldoon, calm down... You could ve said this about 1390958 different ways, and have been polite at the same time.  Just because you are having a bad day,
ygData.messageBody:
Wow Mauldoon, calm down...

You could've said this about 1390958 different ways,
and have been polite at the same time. Just because
you are having a bad day, don't take it out on
everyone else.

Gazamel Prime
Champion of Ak'Anon, 54 medals earned
Solusek Ro
